summary: Veins never deplete when mining, and mining is uninterrupted.
descriptionHtml:
Veins never deplete when mining, and mining is uninterrupted.

Compatibility?
Should be compatible with everything in existence... well almost everything... This mod contains no .esps or anything of the sort, it simply modifies the mining script... removes one line. I\'d be willing to bet that anything else that modified the same script would either overwrite this mod or this mod would take priority.

If you want to make iron ore more useful check out my Cheaper Transmutation mod located here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28864 which turns iron directly into gold ore.
author: Aderic
